users

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • users.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonRandoPlayer, Rando_Cardrissian

    public abstract class Player
extends Object
    A class of object that contains all players including Rando Cardrissian.
    Since:
    CAH1.0
    Version:
    CAH1.0
    Author:
    Holt Maki
    See Also:
    nonRandoPlayer}, {@linkplain Rando_Cardrissian}, {@linkplain humanPlayer}, {@linkplain AIPlayer}
